metadata.Description: An Arabic Twitter dataset of 5,011 tweets, manually annotated for dangerous speech (direct physical threats). Collected using a multi-dialectal lexicon, it's designed for training models to detect harmful online content.
metadata.Paper Title: Understanding and Detecting Dangerous Speech in Social Media
Affiliations: Natural Langauge Processing Lab, The University of British Columbia
